scripts.serve: concurrently --kill-others "ng serve src-a" "ng serve src-b" "ng serve src"
scripts.build: ng build common && ng build controller && ng build client
scripts.build:prod: ng build common --configuration production && ng build controller --configuration production && ng build client --configuration production
scripts.test: ng test common && ng test controller && ng test client
scripts.coverage: ng build common && ng test common --watch=false --browsers=ChromeHeadlessCustom --codeCoverage=true && ng test controller --watch=false --browsers=ChromeHeadlessCustom --codeCoverage=true && ng test client --watch=false --browsers=ChromeHeadlessCustom --codeCoverage=true
scripts.lint: ng lint common && ng lint controller && ng lint client
scripts.e2e: concurrently  -k --success first --kill-others "npm run serve" "npm run wait && npm run protractor"
